channel.title: Who am I? - Dezible
channel.description: And why do I want to talk about this topic? My name is Aditya Bhardwaj and am currently a PhD candidate at University of Twente - you can find me here through LinkedIn profile I am deeply interested in following the progress in the area of XAI, specially in the methods of evaluating such XAI models. And as I am starting to go through academic research for my PhD, I realized that there is a lack of systemized knowledge on XAI. There might a lot of resources on this topic, but are present sparsely.
